titles.title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012
Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012
To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of crop insurance premium subsidies in the public interest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit

bill.summary: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of specified crop insurance premium subsidy information in the public interest.
